info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 2:39PM MDT until July 03 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lemhi County in east central Idaho... Southwestern Ravalli County in west central Montana... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 238 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Conner to 18 miles northwest of Gibbonsville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conner and Sula. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
